comments.raw_text:
This is on Aurora 2011-10-16. One of my windows has the drag indicator just hanging out, smoking a cigarette.

No STR, I'm afraid, but figured I'd file anyway.

Dragging a folder around makes it disappear at the end of the drag.
comments.author: bugzilla@twinql.com
